mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD_HASH, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, THEME_PREFERENCE, COLOR_PREFERENCE, FONT_PREFERENCE, MODE_PREFERENCE, IS_ADMIN, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{themePreference}, #{colorPreference}, #{fontPreference}, #{modePreference}, #{isAdmin}, #{isActive}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD_HASH, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, THEME_PREFERENCE, COLOR_PREFERENCE, FONT_PREFERENCE, MODE_PREFERENCE, IS_ADMIN, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
